coreAttributes.name: maid's dress
coreAttributes.description: A heavily stylised Maid's dress, it consists of a coloured one-piece dress with decorative white lace trimmings. A small white apron is attached to the front, and is similarly trimmed in white lace.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(reach)] back and [npc.verb(unzip)] [npc.her] maid's dress, before pulling [npc.her] [npc.arms] out, sliding it down [npc.her] body, and finally [npc.stepping] out of it.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] the back of [npc2.namePos] maid's dress, before pulling [npc2.her] [npc2.arms] free to allow the dress to fall to the floor.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(unzip)] the back of [npc2.namePos] maid's dress, before roughly pulling [npc2.her] [npc2.arms] free and yanking the dress to the floor.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.step] into the dress and [npc.verb(pull)] it up over [npc.her] torso, zipping [npc.herself] up at the back before making sure the trimmings and apron are neatly arranged.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to [npc2.step] into the dress, before pulling it up over [npc2.her] torso. Zipping [npc2.herHim] up at the back, [npc.she] then [npc.verb(make)] sure that the trimmings and apron are neatly arranged.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to [npc2.step] into the dress, before yanking it up over [npc2.her] torso. Forcefully zipping [npc2.herHim] up at the back, [npc.she] then [npc.verb(make)] sure that the trimmings and apron are neatly arranged.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc.her] maid's dress.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc2.namePos] maid's dress.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc2.namePos] maid's dress.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc.her] maid's dress.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc2.namePos] maid's dress.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc2.namePos] maid's dress.
